items.name: Proposal Reel
items.title: We're Getting Married · 60–90s (Proposal Reel)
items.description: A 60–90 second vertical proposal/trailer video reel generated from your own 10–20 photos and 3 short video clips, complete with auto subtitles and beat-synced captions. Perfect for sharing on social media or live display, letting you easily relive your romantic moment. Wedding proposal video generator.
instructions: Upload 10–20 photos and 3 video clips (3–5 seconds each; ensure quality and variety).
Fill in event details: anniversary date, proposal location, and 3 vow keywords.
Select style: Clean Studio / Warm Film / Elegant Gold.
(Optional) Invite your partner to co-edit each person's habits/nicknames.
Preview and refine the key subtitle moments, then export in 9:16, 1080p (60–90s).

fields.name: Target Hairstyle
fields.placeholder: e.g. Long Hair, Short Hair, etc.

items.name: First Dance Folk
items.title: First Dance · Gentle Folk (Custom Love Song)
items.description: A personalized 2–3 minute wedding or proposal song generated from your love story (lyrics, melody, and vocals), delivered as high-quality WAV/MP3 and lyric text. Make your first dance memorable with a unique audio keepsake. Custom wedding song audio generator.
instructions: Provide 5 story highlights, both your nicknames, and preferred tempo (slow/medium).
Select style: Indie Folk / Piano Ballad / City Pop (solo or duet).
(Optional) Upload a 10–20 second voice message for emotional reference (no celebrity voice cloning).
Preview lyrics and song structure, confirm to generate vocals and mix.
Export WAV/MP3 and lyrics (includes 15s/30s social media snippets).

items.name: Wedding Studio · Classic White
items.title: Studio Wedding · Classic White (Portraits)
items.description: Classic studio-style wedding portraits generated with consistent lighting and natural skin tones. Receive 6–12 high-resolution photos in 4K, ideal for print and sharing. Studio wedding portrait image generator.
instructions: Each uploads 5–8 clear front/half-body photos (unobstructed, even lighting).
Choose posing and background: High Key White / Soft Focus Film / Classic Black & White.
Select natural skin touch-up and blemish reduction levels.
(Optional) Set a unified style profile for use in future sets.
Generate and choose 6–12 photos, then export in 4K (printable).

items.name: Our Year Recap
items.title: Our Year · 90s (Annual Recap Film)
items.description: Automatically create a monthly recap video film, sequenced from your favorite photos. Export in landscape 16:9 1080p—a perfect way to celebrate anniversaries and milestones. Family or couple annual recap video generator.
instructions: Upload 30–50 photos (organized by month or event in folders is recommended).
Optionally, upload 2–3 video clips (3–5 seconds each) as transitions.
Select style: Film 400 / Minimal Clean / Scrapbook.
Enter three highlight events and important dates from the year (for captions).
Preview and adjust order/titles, export in 16:9 1080p (about 90s).

items.name: Anniversary Piano
items.title: Anniversary · Piano Adagio (Theme Song)
items.description: A custom 90–120s piano or ambient anniversary theme song, including a looped version and 15/30s segment for your video. The perfect audio accompaniment for celebrating your love journey. Personalized anniversary theme audio music generator.
instructions: Enter three yearly highlights and 3–5 key growth words.
Select style: Piano / Ambient Pad / Soft Strings.
Specify use case (video/ambient track); the system will auto-match dynamics.
Preview the motif and harmonic direction, confirm to render the full song.
Export WAV/MP3 (includes 15s/30s loop versions).

items.name: Neon Night Portrait
items.title: Anniversary Portrait · Neon Night (Portrait)
items.description: City night neon-style portrait photos with unified color tone and enhanced skin for a unique modern look. Receive 6–10 high-resolution photos in 2K/4K. Neon effect couple or anniversary photo image generator.
instructions: Each uploads 3–5 nighttime or indoor photos (clearly visible).
Select hue: Neo Tokyo / Cyber Neon / City Glow.
Enable skin brightening and noise suppression (night-friendly).
(Optional) Add date and location captions.
Generate and export 6–10 photos in 2K/4K.

items.name: Bridge the Miles
items.title: Bridge the Miles · 45–60s (Long Distance Split Reel)
items.description: A split-screen narrative video for long-distance couples, featuring map transitions and story highlights. Export vertical 9:16 1080p videos, 45–60 seconds runtime. Long-distance love story video generator.
instructions: Each uploads 3–4 daily short videos (2–3 seconds) and 2 city landmark photos.
Enter both cities and time differences (for captions/map).
Select style: Clean Minimal / Pastel / Postcard.
(Optional) Add a countdown or date of next meeting.
Preview with beat sync, export in 9:16 1080p.

items.name: Voice-to-Song Mini
items.title: Voice to Love Song · 60–75s (Mini Song)
items.description: Turn two voice messages and special keywords into a 60–75s short love song, including a 15s ringtone-ready hook. Makes for a unique personalized audio gift. Love message to song audio generator.
instructions: Upload 10–20 second voice message each (Mandarin/English).
Enter theme keywords (missing you/promise/countdown, etc).
Select style: Lo-fi / City Pop / Light EDM.
Confirm lyrics summary and hook melody to generate full song.
Export MP3 (includes 15s hook version).

items.name: Virtual Together
items.title: Across Cities · Virtual Portrait (Group Photo)
items.description: Realistic composite group portraits, bringing friends or couples together in the same scene—even from different cities. Receive 8–12 high-res 4K photos with balanced lighting and perspective. Group or family composite image generator.
instructions: Each uploads 6–10 clear headshots/half-body photos (unobstructed, various angles).
Choose a scene: café / subway platform / seaside sunset.
System automatically arranges light and shadow. Preview and fine-tune positions/expressions.
(Optional) Embed date and city corner badges.
Generate and export 8–12 photos in 4K.

items.name: Weekend Trip Reel
items.title: Weekend Trip · 30–45s (Travel Reel)
items.description: Generate a lively travel highlight video—map, transit, arrival, and highlight montage all in one vertical 9:16 1080p video (30–45s). Great for sharing your travel adventures. Travel reel video generator.
instructions: Upload 15–25 travel photos and 2–3 transition videos (2–3 seconds each).
Select style: Warm Film / Hand-written Title / Polaroid Frame.
Enter city name and 3 landmarks (for captions/transitions).
Preview beat timing and sequence, export in 9:16 1080p (30–45s).
(Optional) Auto-generate cover and thumbnail.

items.name: Urban Electronica
items.title: City Walk · Urban Electronica (Loop BGM)
items.description: Generate a 60–90s loopable urban electronica audio music for city walks, based on city and walking tempo, plus a 10s logo sting. Great for video background or personal enjoyment. Urban electronic music audio generator.
instructions: Enter city name, walking tempo (BPM 90–110), and three landmarks.
Select style: House/Lounge / Chillhop / Light Future Bass.
Preview groove and melody, confirm loop points and fadeout.
Export MP3 (60–90s) and 10s logo sting.

items.name: Travel Diary · Film 400
items.title: Travel Diary · Film 400 (Photos)
items.description: Travel film photo set in Film 400 style, with uniform grain and nostalgic color tones. Get 12–18 high-resolution 2K/4K photos for print or sharing. Film-style travel photo image generator.
instructions: Upload 10–20 travel photos (well-exposed, clear subjects).
Select film style: Kodak-like / Fuji-like / Pastel Film (avoid trademarks).
(Optional) Set light leak/frame/date stamp intensity.
Generate and export 12–18 photos in 2K/4K (printable).

items.name: Baby Day Mini
items.title: Baby's Little Day · 45s (Parent-Child Moments)
items.description: A soft, documentary-style 45s vertical video reel using baby's daily photos and short clips, with timestamp captions and smooth transitions. Capture and treasure everyday growth. Baby family highlight reel video generator.
instructions: Upload 10–15 baby photos and 2 short clips (3–5 seconds).
Select style: Soft Pastel / Paper Scrapbook / Gentle Light.
Enter baby's nickname, birth date, and 3 milestone events from the day.
Preview and adjust ordering/subtitles, export 9:16 1080p (~45s).

items.name: Custom Lullaby
items.title: Lullaby · Gentle Piano (Custom)
items.description: A unique 60–90s custom lullaby audio for your baby, generated with gentle piano or music box tones and safe volume limits. Includes a short looped version for sleep time. Personalized baby lullaby music generator.
instructions: Enter baby's nickname, birthdate, and 20–40 character parental message.
Choose instrumentation: Piano / Music Box / Soft Pad.
Preview melody and speed (BPM 60–80), confirm to render.
Export WAV/MP3 (includes 30s gentle loop version).

items.name: Newborn Studio Soft
items.title: Newborn · Soft Studio (Portraits)
items.description: Cream-toned, soft-focus newborn portrait photos with a focus on safe and adorable poses. Get 8–12 high-quality images in 4K, perfect for prints or albums. Newborn baby studio photo image generator.
instructions: Upload 6–10 clear newborn photos (ensure safe posing and head support).
Choose background and prop intensity: Creamy Soft / Natural Skin / Minimal Prop.
Enable light skin retouching (gentle red/peeling fix).
Generate and select 8–12, export in 4K ready to print.
